initial:
A navigation bar is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.navbar(id, btns=[], client='client', method='select', style='w3-blue-grey w3-xlarge')
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the navbar
btnsButtons to be hold by the navigation bar
clientObject that will answer buttons selection (if not defined by the button)
methodObject's method that will answer buttons selection (if not defined by the button)
styleNavigation bar style (w3css)
